content: chain 1 double_crochet in next and each chain to end turn row 2 chain 1 2 double_crochet in 1st st *skip next 2 sts 1 single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st repeat from * to last 3 sts counting t-chain as a st skip next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in top of t-chain turn row 3 chain 3 skip 1st st 1 double_crochet in next and each st to end ending with last double_crochet in top of t-chain turn note this last t-chain is easy to miss it s the chain-1 from the beginning of row 2 please don t forget to work the final double_crochet of this row into this t-chain or your next row will not work repeat row 2 and 3 for silt pattern st crocheting the pixie hat notes 1 to work a decrease -- work 1 double_crochet in next st until 2 lps rem on hook work a 2nd double_crochet into next st until 3 lps rem on hook yo and draw thru all 3 lps on hook 2 to work a dc3tog -- work 1 double_crochet in next st until 2 lps rem on hook work a 2nd double_crochet into next st until 3 lps rem on hook work a 3rd double_crochet into next st until 4 lps rem on hook yo and draw thru all 4 lps on hook 3 to work a dc4tog -- work 1 double_crochet in next st until 2 lps rem on hook work a 2nd double_crochet into next st until 3 lps rem on hook work a 3rd double_crochet into next st until 4 lps rem on hook work a 4th double_crochet into next st until 5 lps rem on hook yo and draw thru all 5 lps on hook starting at the folded brim chain 57 63 69 75 row 1 ws skip 2 chain *work 1 single_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet in next chain skip 2 chain repeat from * ending with 1 single_crochet in last chain turn row 2 rs chain 1 skip 1st single_crochet skip next double_crochet *work 1 single_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space skip next single_crochet skip next double_crochet repeat from * to last single_crochet and t-chain skip last single_crochet 1 single_crochet in top of t-chain turn row 3 to 5 repeat row 2 change to silt pattern stitch as follows row 6 chain 3 skip 1st single_crochet *1 double_crochet in next double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 1 double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * to t-chain skip t-chain turn = 55 61 67 73 double_crochet counting chain-3 at beg as 1 double_crochet row 7 work row 2 of silt pattern stitch y page 2 of 6 swb-c00058 y  copyright sweaterbabe com all rights reserved worldwide sweaterbabe com
